name: maze (itch) (EMP|Games)
description:
I went to draw a sprite this evening. I created a 32x32 file and started drawing random stuff and erasing it. (I am not an artist in the slightest). I then went from thinking about an entire image to just the pixels themselves. I wondered, what can I do with 1,024 pixels? It seems like a lot of squares to work with. That's when I decided to make a maze.

In the game the maze and the character sprites are blown up 1600% so you can see what you're doing.

It was a fun way to spend a few hours as I wait for work to let out.
